It is said that “Education can Change the World”. What according to you are the key contributions of Education in Modern Society?

  The world has realised the need for the education. So, United nations have come up with many programs to implement in the developing world. Especially, India has reached a stage where the government of India has come up with many programs like "Sakshar Bharat" stressing the need for educated India. So, Before going to discuss the contributions of Education to the modern society it is necessary to understand the importance of the education and its impact on the society.

  Education has ushered in new thinking prowess to the society. It enabled the down trodden and distressed people in the society to raise their voices. it provided them some courage to fight against the social evils that have hindered their progress. In a nutshell, we can say the entire society has changed its thought process and enabled the society to move ahead with new found vigour.

Now, its good time to discuss the contributions of Education in Modern society. With the increased literacy rates across the globe, the entire world has become like a global village. It enhanced the understanding capacity of the people to a great extent there by enabling the people to understand and make use of the new and ever evolving technologies. it also helped the world to formulate new societal values that brought in communal harmony. With the increased educational facilities, more job opportunities have come up for the younger generations. Gender bias(pertaining to women) has come down to a considerable extent.  People understood the need for right to equality. Modern forms have come into existence in prose and poetry.  Cultural barriers and social stigmas like devadasi system in India has been eradicated to a great extent. Exchange of Ideas and cultures took place allowing the people from one region to know about the people from the other regions. This cultureal exchange has lead to the destruction of social barriers and boundaries that existed in many countires for centuries.
